医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
研究发现考虑性别可提高心力衰竭 CMR 生物标志物的精确度和预后性能研究人员调查了性别对心力衰竭（HF）诊断中左心室充盈压（LVFP）的心脏磁共振（CMR）评估的影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240517/Study-finds-accounting-for-sex-improves- precision-and-prognostic-performance-of-CMR-biomarkers-for-heart-failure.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240517/Study-finds-accounting-for-sex-improves- precision-and-prognostic-performance-of-CMR-biomarkers-for-heart-failure.aspx#评论https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=af494145-2fab-4916-99dc-12d9f311fdba Fri, 17 May 2024 12:21:00 -0400 Study finds accounting for sex improves precision and prognostic performance of CMR biomarkers for heart failure
血液中的蛋白质可以在人们诊断出癌症之前七年多向人们发出癌症警告英国研究人员利用观察和遗传学方法对英国生物银行的参与者调查了 1,463 种血浆蛋白与 19 种癌症之间的关联。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240517/Proteins-in-the-blood-could-warn-people-of-cancer-more-than-seven-years-before-it-is-diagnosed。 ASPX https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240517/Proteins-in-the-blood-could-warn-people-of-cancer-more-than-seven-years-before-it-is-diagnosed。 aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a2283578-c5e3-428e-8a3b-97812c7c805b Fri, 17 May 2024 11:36:00 -0400 Proteins in the blood could warn people of cancer more than seven years before it is diagnosed
充分利用酶标仪：使用建议在本次采访中，NewsMed 与 Ann-Cathrin Volz 和 Martin Mangold 讨论了酶标仪和使用建议。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240517/Get-the-best-out-of-your-microplate-reader-recommendations-for-use.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240517/Get-the-best-out-of-your-microplate-reader-recommendations-for-use.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a6c70496-2b40-41d2-b85e-26923acbd959 Fri, 17 May 2024 09:07:00 -0400 Get the best out of your microplate reader: recommendations for use
FDA 批准 Nova 的 Stat Profile Prime Plus 分析仪用于微毛细管样品模式Nova Biomedical 很高兴地宣布美国食品和药物管理局 (FDA) 已批准 Stat Profile Prime Plus® 重症监护分析仪上的微毛细管样本模式使用 510(k) 许可。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240517/FDA-clears-Novae28099s-Stat-Profile-Prime-Plus-analyzer-for-micro-capillary-sample-mode.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240517/FDA-clears-Novae28099s-Stat-Profile-Prime-Plus-analyzer-for-micro-capillary-sample-mode.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2c4da5da-d711-4fad-bf29-04fb4efb322a Fri, 17 May 2024 08:48:00 -0400 FDA clears Nova’s Stat Profile Prime Plus analyzer for micro capillary sample mode
阳光和公益事业：Bedfont® Scientific 的团队在肯特临终关怀中心 2024 年风信子步行活动中筹集重要资金。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240517/Sunshine-and-Steps-for-a-Cause-Bedfontc2ae-Scientifice28099s-Team-Raise-Vital-Funds-at-Heart-of-Kent-Hospicee28099s-风信子-Walk-2024.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240517/Sunshine-and-Steps-for-a-Cause-Bedfontc2ae-Scientifice28099s-Team-Raise-Vital-Funds-at-Heart-of-Kent-Hospicee28099s-风信子-Walk-2024.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8ac922f5-e2d9-445e-b9d3-2c5b1efce16e Fri, 17 May 2024 08:45:00 -0400 Sunshine and Steps for a Cause: Bedfont® Scientific’s Team Raise Vital Funds at Heart of Kent Hospice’s Bluebell Walk 2024.
复兴被拒绝的药物：新型选择性抗生素显示出希望二十年前，一种候选药物因其副作用而被拒绝。研究人员现在已经找到了如何使后继分子更具选择性的方法。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240517/Reviving-a-rejected-drug-New-selective-antibiotic-shows-promise.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240517/Reviving-a-rejected-drug-New-selective-antibiotic-shows-promise.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ecc5b43c-1bef-4f34-a65a-d9ddd7645c60 Fri, 17 May 2024 07:39:00 -0400 Reviving a rejected drug: New selective antibiotic shows promise
突破性成像技术揭示近视眼的详细巩膜模式眼病在世界范围内极为普遍，最近的估计表明，全球三分之一的人口患有某种类型的视力障碍。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240517/Breakthrough-imaging-technique-uncovers-detailed-scleral-patterns-in-myopic-eyes.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240517/Breakthrough-imaging-technique-uncovers-detailed-scleral-patterns-in-myopic-eyes.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=968c8f36-ed9c-4d1a-955f-6df1081c73b2 Fri, 17 May 2024 07:30:00 -0400 Breakthrough imaging technique uncovers detailed scleral patterns in myopic eyes
研究表明，对于非常晚期的实体瘤，全身治疗不会带来生存获益德克萨斯大学 MD 安德森癌症中心和耶鲁大学癌症中心的研究人员今天在《美国医学会杂志肿瘤学》上发表的一项研究表明，患有非常晚期实体瘤的患者在接受全身治疗后总体生存率没有显着改善。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240517/Study-reveals-no-survival-benefit-from-systemic-therapy-in-very-advanced-solid-tumors.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240517/Study-reveals-no-survival-benefit-from-systemic-therapy-in-very-advanced-solid-tumors.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6dbf19fb-66ee-4d91-853d-41e78e7e7602 Fri, 17 May 2024 07:23:00 -0400 Study reveals no survival benefit from systemic therapy in very advanced solid tumors
进餐时分心与享乐消费增加有关美国心理学会发表的研究表明，如果你在吃饭时倾向于做其他事情或分心，那么你以后可能会面临过度享受日常乐趣的风险，这可能是因为分心导致你享受不到乐趣。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240517/Distraction-during-meals-linked-to-increased-hedonic-conspiration.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240517/Distraction-during-meals-linked-to-increased-hedonic-conspiration.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=32b48ccb-da24-44cc-9b43-16d5e17b3009 Fri, 17 May 2024 07:15:00 -0400 Distraction during meals linked to increased hedonic consumption
研究表明社交媒体的高使用率与青少年吸烟和吸电子烟的增加有关年轻人使用社交媒体平台以及吸烟和电子烟的风险。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240517/Study-links-high-social-media-use-to-increased-smoking-and-vaping-among-youth.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240517/Study-links-high-social-media-use-to-increased-smoking-and-vaping-among-youth.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b09664b3-2ab9-4f93-a2c0-65746d576ccf Fri, 17 May 2024 07:11:00 -0400 Study links high social media use to increased smoking and vaping among youth
